layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x64
  RenderBlock {test} at (0,0) size 800x64
    RenderBlock {p} at (0,16) size 800x32
      RenderInline (pseudo:before) at (0,0) size 179x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        RenderTextFragment at (0,0) size 179x16
          text run at (0,0) width 179: "GENERATED CONTENT "
      RenderText {#text} at (178,0) size 735x32
        text run at (178,0) width 557: "You should see before this paragraph the words GENERATED CONTENT over green"
        text run at (0,16) width 76: "background"
